casebody.data:
David Lee TURNER
v.
STATE of North Carolina. No. 149P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2004. David Lee Turner, Pro Se. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 28th day of June 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2004."
